description: Teacher requests an extra‑credit notification for the 7A Math class; the assistant composes the message, uses the notification_sender tool, and confirms delivery.

messages.content: You are ClassPulse Assistant, an AI that helps teachers monitor attendance, grades, curriculum alignment, and communicate with students, parents, and administrators. You may use the provided tools to perform actions such as sending notifications, querying data, and generating recommendations.

Please send a push notification to all students in my 7A math class about the extra credit opportunity for the upcoming test. Include the details: complete the optional worksheet on page 42, submit it via Google Classroom by Friday, March 15, and you’ll earn up to 5 extra points.
Got it! I’ll send the extra‑credit announcement to every student in class 7A_math.

arguments.message: Extra Credit Opportunity! Complete the optional worksheet on page 42 and submit it via Google Classroom by Friday, March 15. You can earn up to 5 extra points toward the upcoming test. Good luck!

messages.content: Notification sent successfully to 30 students in class 7A_math.
All right! The extra‑credit announcement has been delivered to the 30 students in 7A math. Let me know if you need anything else, such as tracking submissions or reviewing the impact on grades.
